casebody.data:
In the Matter of Eichler Corporation Marvin B. KAPELUS, Appellant, v. Stuart M. KAPLAN, Trustee, Appellee. No. 24405. United States Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. April 16, 1971. Marvin B. Kapelus, in pro. per. John T. Hansen (argued), San Francisco, Cal., for appellee.

Before CHAMBERS and BARNES, Circuit Judges, and THOMPSON, District Judge.

PER CURIAM:

The order of the district court confirming the findings of the referee is affirmed.
